    • extractPart

      public Sound extractPart​(double tmin, double tmax, boolean preserveTimes) throws PraatException
      Extract a portion of this audio stream. This function will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the given window is outside of the data range.
      Parameters:
      tmin -
      tmax -
      preserveTimes -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if (tmin, tmax) is outside of this sound's range
      PraatException
